00007 #ifndef MECAB_DICTIONARY_H
00008 #define MECAB_DICTIONARY_H
00009 
00010 #include "mecab.h"
00011 #include "darts.h"
00012 #include "char_property.h"
00013 
00014 namespace MeCab {
00015 
00016 class Param;
00017 template <class T> class Mmap;
00018 
00019 class Dictionary {
00020  private:
00021   Mmap<char>         *dmmap_;
00022   const Token        *token_;
00023   const char         *feature_;
00024   const char         *charset_;
00025   unsigned int        version_;
00026   unsigned int        type_;
00027   unsigned int        lexsize_;
00028   unsigned int        lsize_;
00029   unsigned int        rsize_;
00030   std::string         filename_;
00031   whatlog             what_;
00032   Darts::DoubleArray  da_;
00033 
00034  public:
00035   typedef Darts::DoubleArray::result_pair_type result_type;
00036 
00037   bool open(const char *filename,
00038             const char *mode = "r");
00039   void close();
00040 
00041   size_t commonPrefixSearch(const char* key, size_t len,
00042                             result_type *result,
00043                             size_t rlen) {
00044     return da_.commonPrefixSearch(key, result, rlen, len);
00045   }
00046 
00047   result_type exactMatchSearch(const char* key) {
00048     result_type n;
00049     da_.exactMatchSearch(key, n);
00050     return n;
00051   }
00052 
00053   bool isCompatible(const Dictionary &d) const {
00054     return(version_ == d.version_ &&
00055            lsize_  == d.lsize_   &&
00056            rsize_  == d.rsize_   &&
00057            decode_charset(charset_) ==
00058            decode_charset(d.charset_));
00059   }
00060 
00061   const char *filename() const { return filename_.c_str(); }
00062   const char *charset() const { return const_cast<const char*>(charset_); }
00063   unsigned short version() const { return version_; }
00064   size_t  size() const { return static_cast<size_t>(lexsize_); }
00065   int type() const { return static_cast<int>(type_);  }
00066   size_t lsize() const { return static_cast<size_t>(lsize_); }
00067   size_t rsize() const { return static_cast<size_t>(rsize_); }
00068 
00069   const Token *token(const result_type &n) const {
00070     return token_ +(n.value >> 8);
00071   }
00072   size_t token_size(const result_type &n) const { return 0xff & n.value; }
00073   const char  *feature(const Token &t) const { return feature_ + t.feature; }
00074 
00075   static bool compile(const Param &param,
00076                       const std::vector<std::string> &dics,
00077                       const char *matrix_file,
00078                       const char *matrix_bin_file,
00079                       const char *left_id_file,
00080                       const char *right_id_file,
00081                       const char *rewrite_file,
00082                       const char* pos_id_file,
00083                       const char* output);  // outputs
00084 
00085   const char *what() { return what_.str(); }
00086 
00087   explicit Dictionary(): dmmap_(0), token_(0),
00088                          feature_(0), charset_(0) {}
00089   virtual ~Dictionary() { this->close(); }
00090 };
00091 }
00092 #endif
